input: Subject: A lively sports stadium; Characteristics: packed stands and vibrant team colors; Timing and lighting: evening with floodlights; Background: expansive field and scoreboard; Feeling: exciting and spirited.
coverage: A lively sports stadium filled with packed stands adorned in vibrant team colors, fans cheering and waving banners energetically. The scene is set in the evening under bright floodlights casting dynamic shadows across the expansive field and illuminating the large scoreboard. The background features the green turf and stands stretching into the night sky. The image evokes an exciting and spirited atmosphere, capturing the thrill and passion of the game.
